name: cubica woo
description:
cubica woo

move / capture

Ok, you - the cube.
Moving, you capture territory. Make it faster than the other cubes.

Only two rules:
- Do not hitting the wall
- Do not deprive yourself of its territory
Calculates the distance, a "dash" can help you get out of the difficult situation

Menu:
K - choose
L - back
P - pause

Play:
WSAD - move
K - dash

When designing I have used:
- Game Maker: Studio
- KORG Gadget
- Pyxel Edit

UPDATE to 1.0.1

- upgrade UI
- new animation
- added ability (dash)

by image/31 for ludum dare 37

Thanks for playing at this.
